content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), small-electric-pole(position x=7.5, y=-0.5), and small-electric-pole(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Offshore pump at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5) and connected pipe group

### Furnace group at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0)
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0)
- Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0)
- Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power and research automation

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected before attempting connection
- Make sure that the entities are compatible for connection
### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections
### Errors when placing pipes
- Ensure that the pipe group is not full before attempting to add more pipes
- Make sure that the pipes are connected to a valid fluid system
### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a valid fluid system before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the offshore pump has a valid connection point
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure that the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the furnace fuel source is not full before attempting to use it
